item.title: Michelle add a quote by Anonymous
item.description: "He has shown you, O man, what is good. And what does the Lord require of you? But to act justly, and to love mercy, and to walk humbly with your God." -- Anonymous

item.title: Michelle add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "If a man thinks he is not conceited, he is very conceited indeed." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Michelle add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "A children's story that can only be enjoyed by children is not a good children's story in the slightest." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Michelle add a quote by John Cleese
item.description: "And now for something completely different . . . " -- John Cleese

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Donald Miller
item.description: "And if these mountains had eyes, they would wake to find two strangers in their fences, standing in admiration as a breathing red pours its tinge upon earth's shore. These mountains, which have seen untold sunrises, long to thunder praise but stand reverent, silent so that man's weak praise should be given God's attention." -- Donald Miller
